languages.text: -Restores {uip|Heal|d722bfac662c40f9b2a47dc6ea70d00a} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. -Removes {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}. -Heals one fresh injury, or, if none, one old injury upon a successful Medicae {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. -If the character has the Combat Medicae or Field Medic talents, the amount of restored wounds will be increased by the bonuses provided by these talents.
languages.original_text: - Восстанавливает (9 + {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Медицина{/g} применяющего / 4) {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}. - Снимает эффекты {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравления{/g}. - Исцеляет одно {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}свежее ранение{/g} или, если у персонажа их нет, одно старое ранение при успешной {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверке{/g} Медицины. - Если персонаж овладел талантами Полевая медицина или Лечение в бою, то количество восстановленного здоровья будет увеличено на бонус от соответствующего таланта.

traits.locale_text: -Restores (9 + Medicae / 4) {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. -Removes {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}. -Heals one fresh injury, or, if none, one old injury upon a successful Medicae {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. -If the character has the Combat Medicae or Field Medic talents, the amount of restored wounds will be increased by the bonuses provided by these talents.

-Restores {uip|Heal|d722bfac662c40f9b2a47dc6ea70d00a} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. -Removes {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}. -Heals one fresh injury, or, if none, one old injury upon a successful Medicae {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. -If the character has the Combat Medicae or Field Medic talents, the amount of restored wounds will be increased by the bonuses provided by these talents.

-Restores {uip|Heal|d722bfac662c40f9b2a47dc6ea70d00a} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. -Removes {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}. -Heals one fresh injury, or, if none, one old injury upon a successful Medicae {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. -If the character has the Combat Medicae or Field Medic talents, the amount of restored wounds will be increased by the bonuses provided by these talents.

languages.text: -Восстанавливает {uip|Heal|d722bfac662c40f9b2a47dc6ea70d00a} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}. -Снимает эффекты {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравления{/g}. -Исцеляет одно свежее ранение или, если у персонажа их нет, одно старое ранение при успешной {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверке{/g} Медицины. -Если персонаж овладел талантами Полевая медицина или Лечение в бою, то количество восстановленного здоровья будет увеличено на бонус от соответствующего таланта.
languages.original_text: -Restores {uip|Heal|d722bfac662c40f9b2a47dc6ea70d00a} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. -Removes {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}. -Heals one fresh injury, or, if none, one old injury upon a successful Medicae {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. -If the character has the Combat Medicae or Field Medic talents, the amount of restored wounds will be increased by the bonuses provided by these talents.

traits.locale_text: -Восстанавливает {uip|Heal|d722bfac662c40f9b2a47dc6ea70d00a} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}. -Снимает эффекты {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравления{/g}. -Исцеляет одно свежее ранение или, если у персонажа их нет, одно старое ранение при успешной {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверке{/g} Медицины. -Если персонаж овладел талантами Полевая медицина или Лечение в бою, то количество восстановленного здоровья будет увеличено на бонус от соответствующего таланта.

languages.text: - 恢复{uip|Heal|d722bfac662c40f9b2a47dc6ea70d00a}点{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。 - 移除{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}效果。 - 治疗一处新伤，如果该角色没有新伤，则可以尝试进行医疗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，治疗一处旧伤。 - 如果该角色拥有战地医疗或野战医疗天赋，恢复的生命值数量也会受到天赋加成影响。
languages.original_text: -Restores {uip|Heal|d722bfac662c40f9b2a47dc6ea70d00a} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. -Removes {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}. -Heals one fresh injury, or, if none, one old injury upon a successful Medicae {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. -If the character has the Combat Medicae or Field Medic talents, the amount of restored wounds will be increased by the bonuses provided by these talents.

traits.locale_text: 恢复<u>（10+（使用者的{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}医疗{/g}技能/5））</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。

- 恢复{uip|Heal|d722bfac662c40f9b2a47dc6ea70d00a}点{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。 - 移除{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}效果。 - 治疗一处{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}新伤{/g}，如果该角色没有新伤，则可以尝试进行医疗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，治疗一处旧伤。 - 如果该角色拥有战地医疗或野战医疗天赋，恢复的生命值数量也会受到天赋加成影响。

languages.text: -Restaura {uip|Heal|d722bfac662c40f9b2a47dc6ea70d00a} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}. -Elimina los efectos de {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g}. -Cura una lesión reciente, o, si no la hay, una lesión vieja si se supera una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de Medicae. -Si el personaje tiene los talentos Medicae de combate o Medicina de campo, la cantidad de heridas restauradas aumenta según la bonificación que proporcionan sus talentos.
languages.original_text: -Restores {uip|Heal|d722bfac662c40f9b2a47dc6ea70d00a} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. -Removes {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}. -Heals one fresh injury, or, if none, one old injury upon a successful Medicae {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. -If the character has the Combat Medicae or Field Medic talents, the amount of restored wounds will be increased by the bonuses provided by these talents.

traits.locale_text: -Restaura {uip|Heal|d722bfac662c40f9b2a47dc6ea70d00a} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}. -Elimina los efectos de {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g}. -Cura una {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lesión reciente{/g}, o, si no la hay, una lesión vieja si se supera una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de Medicae. -Si el personaje tiene los talentos Medicae de combate o Medicina de campo, la cantidad de heridas restauradas aumenta según la bonificación que proporcionan sus talentos.

languages.text:
-<indent=5%>{uip|Heal|d722bfac662c40f9b2a47dc6ea70d00a}の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}負傷耐性{/g}</u>を回復する。</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}を取り除く。</indent>
-<indent=5%>新たな傷をひとつ治療するか、ない場合はメディケア{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}で成功したときに古傷をひとつ治癒する。</indent>
-<indent=5%>キャラクターが戦闘メディケアか戦場衛生兵の能力を持っている場合、負傷耐性の回復量は、該当する能力のボーナス量に応じて増える。</indent>
languages.original_text: -Restores {uip|Heal|d722bfac662c40f9b2a47dc6ea70d00a} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. -Removes {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}. -Heals one fresh injury, or, if none, one old injury upon a successful Medicae {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. -If the character has the Combat Medicae or Field Medic talents, the amount of restored wounds will be increased by the bonuses provided by these talents.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}を<u>(10 + (使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}メディケア{/g}/5)</u>回復する。

languages.text: -Heilt {uip|Heal|d722bfac662c40f9b2a47dc6ea70d00a} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}. -Entfernt {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g}. -Heilt eine {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}frische Verletzung{/g} oder, falls keine vorhanden ist, eine alte Verletzung nach einer erfolgreichen {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Medicae{/g}-Probe. -Wenn der Charakter über die Talente Gefechts-Medicae oder Gefechtssanitäter verfügt, wird die Anzahl wiederhergestellter Wunden um die Boni erhöht, die durch die entsprechenden Talente gewährt werden.
languages.original_text: -Restores {uip|Heal|d722bfac662c40f9b2a47dc6ea70d00a} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. -Removes {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}. -Heals one fresh injury, or, if none, one old injury upon a successful Medicae {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. -If the character has the Combat Medicae or Field Medic talents, the amount of restored wounds will be increased by the bonuses provided by these talents.

traits.locale_text: -Heilt {uip|Heal|d722bfac662c40f9b2a47dc6ea70d00a} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}. -Entfernt {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g}. -Heilt eine {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}frische Verletzung{/g} oder, falls keine vorhanden ist, eine alte Verletzung nach einer erfolgreichen {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Medicae{/g}-Probe. -Wenn der Charakter über die Talente Gefechts-Medicae oder Gefechtssanitäter verfügt, wird die Anzahl wiederhergestellter Wunden um die Boni erhöht, die durch die entsprechenden Talente gewährt werden.

languages.text: -Restitue {uip|Heal|d722bfac662c40f9b2a47dc6ea70d00a} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} -Supprime les effets {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} -Soigne une lésion récente ou, s'il n'y en a aucune, une lésion ancienne en cas de réussite d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de Medicae -Si le personnage possède les talents Medicae de combat ou Soins de terrain, le nombre de blessures restitué sera augmenté grâce à un bonus octroyé par ces talents.
languages.original_text: -Restores {uip|Heal|d722bfac662c40f9b2a47dc6ea70d00a} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. -Removes {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}. -Heals one fresh injury, or, if none, one old injury upon a successful Medicae {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. -If the character has the Combat Medicae or Field Medic talents, the amount of restored wounds will be increased by the bonuses provided by these talents.

traits.locale_text: -Restitue {uip|Heal|d722bfac662c40f9b2a47dc6ea70d00a} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} -Supprime les effets {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} -Soigne une {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lésion récente{/g} ou, s'il n'y en a aucune, une lésion ancienne en cas de réussite d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de Medicae -Si le personnage possède les talents Medicae de Combat ou Médic de Terrain, la quantité de blessures restituée sera augmentée grâce à un bonus octroyé par ces talents.
